document.title: Upper Teeth Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: This treatment involves the use of clear aligners to address alignment of the upper teeth. The estimated duration for this treatment is between 4 to 6 months. The progress will be primarily monitored remotely. Extensive use of attachments is anticipated to assist in the alignment process. Whitening is included as part of your treatment package.
next_steps: Await instructions on aligner fitting schedule
